comment: I was a huge supporter too, but his vax messaging has completely upended that. I am also extremely disappointed that we are masking our children all day long at school. I also believe it shocking that employees in shops are masked all day long too. Tiny benefit + high health risk

      :snt1 (c / contrast-01

                  :mod (t / too))
            :ARG2 (u / upend-01

                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Vax")))
                  :ARG1 (t2 / that)

      :snt2 (d / disappoint-01
            :ARG0 (m3 / mask-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 w
                              :ARG2 (c3 / child)))
                  :location (s2 / school)
                  :duration (d2 / day
                        :mod (a / all)))
            :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
            :degree (e / extreme)
            :mod (a2 / also))
      :snt3 (b / believe-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (s3 / shock-01
                  :ARG0 (m4 / mask-01
                        :ARG1 (p3 / person
                              :ARG1-of (e2 / employ-01
                                    :location (s4 / shop)))
                        :duration (d3 / day
                              :mod (a3 / all))
                        :mod t)))
      :mod (a4 / also)
      :snt4 (a5 / and
            :op1 (b2 / benefit
                  :mod (t3 / tiny))
            :op2 (r / risk-01
                  :ARG2 (h4 / health)
                  :ARG1-of (h5 / high-02))))

comment: Based on the WC govt messaging encouraging mass participation in these experiments which appear contrary the informed consent obligations of the Nuremberg code, I am afraid that is becoming an increasingly likely outcome. Its sad that its come to this, but it looks ugly!
